author: taylor
msg: patch from Randy Watler, unit tests for docset location

author: taylor
msg: implementation of using a named profile locator specified in the docset metadata to find 'docsets'
docset are collections of links for menus, see .ds files found in the WEB-INF/pages directory
says to use the profileLocator named "docset" defined for the current user to find
all documents matching the regex above
the profiling rule dictates the span of the search, which could be for example a j1 rule or role or rolegroup rule
when visiting each folder in the locator search, the document path regex is applied to find docs to add too the docset
